short_summary: Memory (HPE or equivalent) is required for 6 delivery locations across Canada
description: Memory is required for 6 delivery locations across Canada2022-12-13: Amendment 1: to correct the name of the solicitation in French only2022-12-15: This amendment is raised to Respond to questions regarding this solicitation.2023-01-04: This amendment is raised to Respond to questions and extend the closing date by one week. SSC Memory (HPE or equivalent) for SSC- Amendment 003
